verbs.description: [ARG0: Federal authorities] [V: separated] [ARG1: nearly 2,000 kids] [ARG2: from their families] [ARGM-TMP: during a six - week immigration crackdown along the U.S .- Mexico border] , the Department of Homeland Security said Friday . The revelation came as President Trump turned up his nose at a compromise immigration bill .

[ARG1: The revelation] [V: came] [ARGM-TMP: as President Trump turned up his nose at a compromise immigration bill] .
